title: Moxie
description: This is a website designed for teachers to help them better manage their classroom and students.

title: Cinema Sips
description: This application allows the user to find movies and a drink pairing to match their mood by selecting a mood from the drop-down menu

title: Employee Tracker
description: This app allows the user to search for an employee by name or filter by name or age in order to quickly access basic information about their coworkers

title: Budget Tracker
description: This application allows the user to track income and spending online or offline.

title: Burger Devourer
description: This handlebars app allows the user to enter burgers they would like to devour and then devour them.

title: Note Taker
description: This application allows the user to add, edit, and delete notes by using express, MySQL, and node.
